title: I can't get the new cilent to launch
body: So I had to reinstall league for another glitch (something I won't get into) that didn't bug me too much but after league reinstalled and I hit launch it doesnt work. I have tried using the patcher and opening the cilent via the folder leaguecilent.exe but that doesn't work either. If anyone knows how to fix this it'd be great ðŸ˜€I also tried to run as administrator

replies.body: Generally, the patcher failing to launch can be caused by a security setting preventing it.  My suggestion would be to go through each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore that access and exceptions.  Let me know if you run into any trouble, though.

after some more searching in the folders I found out that the client got corrupted somehow. I would like to say i didn't get a virus cause McAfee normally notifies me whenever I get one and it says it has gotten rid of that virus but maybe one slipped by. Any idea on how fix this?
running a scan rn to see if there is virus
also thx for the fast response, I wasn't thinking you guys would try and help me so quick

I had this problem for a while, turned out avast was causing the game from starting on my laptop. Not sure if it's the same issue for you, but like Porocles said, sounds like a permissions issues. Hope this helps.

Yeah I pressed the orange launch button and it turned gray, but then it just went back to orange and nothing is changing

EDIT: After like 5 minutes it launched but i'm stuck on a black screen
